context: Tests whether the agent builds a talk tracking database following the skill's specific schema, status logic, file skip patterns, and slide source determination rules.

checklist.name: Top-level DB structure
checklist.description: tracking-database.json has top-level keys: config, talks (array), pptx_catalog (array), and confirmed_intents (array)

checklist.name: Config fields present
checklist.description: The config object includes at least: vault_root, talks_source_dir, pptx_source_dir, and template_skip_patterns

checklist.name: Talk fields extracted
checklist.description: Each talk entry includes at least: filename, title, conference, date, and status

checklist.name: URL fields parsed
checklist.description: Talk entries correctly parse video_url and slides_url from the markdown front matter, and extract youtube_id and/or google_drive_id

checklist.name: Pending status default
checklist.description: New talks discovered from markdown files get status 'pending' (not 'new', 'unprocessed', or another term)

checklist.name: Skipped no sources
checklist.description: The 'AI-Assisted Testing' talk (which has no video_url and no slides) is marked with a status indicating it cannot be processed due to missing sources â€” not left as 'pending'

checklist.name: Slide source determination
checklist.description: Talks with both slides_url and pptx_path get slide_source 'both'; talks with only slides_url get 'pdf'; talks with only pptx_path get 'pptx'

checklist.name: Static files skipped
checklist.description: The pptx_catalog or processing log shows that 'DevOps Reframed static.pptx' was skipped/excluded

checklist.name: Conflict copies skipped
checklist.description: The pptx_catalog or processing log shows that 'DevOps Reframed (1).pptx' was skipped/excluded

checklist.name: Template files skipped
checklist.description: The pptx_catalog or processing log shows that the template file was skipped/excluded

checklist.name: PPTX-to-talk matching
checklist.description: The pptx_catalog entries include a reference to their matched talk (by filename or title), with at least 2 correctly matched

checklist.name: State report format
checklist.description: The scan report includes counts of processed/remaining talks and PPTX cataloging stats (cataloged, matched, extracted counts)
